youMove.title: YOU MOVE!
youMove.subtitle: Analyze the position and pick the side you want to play. One side is winning - but which one?

finish-him.title: Finish Him
finish-him.content: First solve a tactical puzzle, then prove your advantage in the endgame against your chosen engine. Skill Points are awarded for wins and equal the sum of material on the board (‚ôü=1, ‚ôû‚ôù=3, ‚ôú=5, ‚ôõ=9). Draws and losses give no points. Completion time is also recorded for leaderboards.

tornado.title: Tornado
tornado.content: Four time controls available: 1+1, 3+2, 5+3, and 10+5 (separate rating in each). Solve as many puzzles as possible within the time limit. Rating calculated using the Glicko2 system based on puzzle difficulty and time spent. Each solved puzzle awards 1 Skill Point.

topFinishHim.title: Finish Him Records
topFinishHim.content: Player rankings by points earned in the 'Finish Him' mode. Points are awarded for each successfully completed task. You can switch between themes to see the leaders in each category.

theoryLeaderboard.title: Theory Records
theoryLeaderboard.content: Player rankings by points earned in theoretical endgames. You can switch between themes to see the leaders in each category.

overallSkill.title: Overall Skill Rating
overallSkill.content: Total Skill Points earned across all game modes for the selected period: week, 14 days, 21 days, or month. Skill Points equal the material sum (‚ôü=1, ‚ôû‚ôù=3, ‚ôú=5, ‚ôõ=9) in Finish Him mode. In Tornado mode, each puzzle awards 1 point. Only wins count.

skillStreak.title: Daily Streak Rating
skillStreak.content: Tracks players who earn at least 100 Skill Points every consecutive day in any mode. Rating based on the number of consecutive days. Missing a day resets the streak. This encourages regular activity and consistent improvement.

skillStreakMega.title: Tornado +300 Every Day
skillStreakMega.content: For the absolute elite: a streak of earning at least 300 Skill Points in Tornado mode daily. Shows the most dedicated and disciplined players. Missing a day in the mode resets the streak.

topToday.title: Top Today
topToday.content: Shows players who earned the most Skill Points during today. The rating resets daily at midnight.

tornadoLeaderboard.title: Tornado Rating
tornadoLeaderboard.content: Ranks players by their highest rating achieved in Tornado mode. Rating calculated using the Glicko2 system based on solved puzzle difficulty and time spent.

limitModal.title: Subscription Limit Reached
limitModal.message: Your current subscription tier "{tier}" allows saving up to {limit} chapters on the server. All other chapters are stored locally on your device and may be lost if browser cache is cleared.

sizeModal.title: Chapter Too Large
sizeModal.message: This chapter is too large to be saved in the cloud (limit is 15,000 characters). Please split your repertoire into multiple chapters to save it to the server.

notifications.savedAsCopy: Chapter saved as your own copy!
notifications.colorRequired: Please select a color for this chapter first.

userCabinet.title: User Cabinet
userCabinet.loginPrompt: Log in to view your statistics and activity.

stats.noData: No data for the selected period.

intro.p1: Welcome to the information page about our future subscription system. The application is currently in open testing mode.
intro.p2: During testing, your account is replenished every hour so you can explore all features for free. After this phase, a daily account replenishment system will be introduced based on your subscription.

bonusInfo.title: üéâ Updated Subscription Bonus Tiers!
bonusInfo.p2: We have updated the terms for automatic bonuses for the most active club players.
bonusInfo.p3: Now you can get a premium tier for free ‚Äî just by playing in team tournaments üèÜ
bonusInfo.p4: Every day, the system analyzes your activity over the last 30 days (tournaments, points, and games) and awards activity points.
bonusInfo.p5: Depending on the amount, one of the tiers is assigned:
bonusInfo.p6: ‚ú® The tier is recalculated automatically and may change depending on your activity.
bonusInfo.p7: No applications needed ‚Äî just play, and the system will do everything itself ‚úÖ
bonusInfo.p8: Thank you for supporting the club ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ôü

insufficientCoins.subMessage: You can learn more about how to top up your balance on the pricing page.

about.title: Chessboard.fun
about.intro: is a professional chess training ecosystem designed to bridge the gap between amateur play and Grandmaster-level preparation through deep analysis and realistic AI sparring.

modes.conversion: Master the art of winning won positions. Proves your advantage against elite engines until Mate or clear resignation.
modes.automaticTacticalTrainer: Our flagship mode. Transform the discovery of brilliant moves into a repeatable skill. Use Gravity Maps to find 'Diamonds', refute blunders, and secure achievements by replaying lines from memory.
modes.botSelectionIntro: Choose your sparring partner based on your training goals:

bots.mozer_2200: (BadGyal 8 - Aggressive tactical opponent optimized for classification)
bots.maia_2200: (Maia 2200 - Master-level human-like play and realistic error patterns)
bots.maia_1900: (Maia 1900 - Club-level human-like play with typical amateur traps)

modes.userCabinet: Your personal command center. Visualize your technical DNA with Nightingale Rose charts across 25+ tactical themes.
modes.analysisPanel: Professional variations management, infinite-depth tree navigation, and real-time MozerBook validation.

features.lichessIntegration: Safe OAuth login and direct linking of achievements to your Lichess profile.
features.advancedStats: Track your progress through Novice, Pro, and Master tiers in every endgame and opening chapter.
features.puzzleDatabase: Leveraging the high-quality Lichess puzzle and evaluation databases:
features.modernUI: A premium, high-performance interface built with Vue.js 3.5 and strict TypeScript.
features.localization: Full support for English, German, and Russian localized environments.

techStack.frontendStack: Vue 3.5 (Composition API), Vite, Pinia, Naive UI

about.contributing: We welcome all contributions to make Chessboard.fun the ultimate training tool! If you have ideas or found a bug, please create an issue or a PR on GitHub.

licenseAndAcknowledgements.gplIntro: This project is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0, promoting transparency and community growth.

stockfish.title: Stockfish 18
stockfish.text1: Analysis and truth-seeking are powered by
stockfish.text2: , the world's strongest open-source chess engine.
stockfish.gplNote: In accordance with the GPLv3, our source code is open and available for the benefit of the global chess community.
stockfish.projectSourceCode: Source Code: Repository public on GitHub
stockfish.gratitude: Deepest gratitude to the Stockfish team for defining the standard of chess evaluation.

maia.title: Maia & BadGyal
maia.text: Realistic sparring is provided by **Maia Chess** and specialized **BadGyal** weights. These neural networks are trained on millions of games to predict moves that feel human, not mechanical. Special thanks to the CSSLab and dkappe for these incredible weights.

lcZero.title: Leela Chess Zero (LCZero)
lcZero.text: Our neural engine layer runs on **LCZero**, the pioneering open-source engine that brought AI-driven chess to the masses. Respect to the LCZero community.

chessground.title: Chessground
chessground.text1: Board rendering is powered by the ultra-fast
chessground.gratitude: Thank you, Lichess, for the best board renderer in the world.

chessops.title: Chessops
chessops.text: Move generation, legality checks, and PGN/FEN parsing are handled by the modular **Chessops** library.
chessops.gratitude: A vital tool for any modern chess application.

credits.lichess: Lichess.org - For the API, puzzle DB, and evaluation sets.
credits.n8n: n8n.io - The flexible nervous system of our backend orchestration.
credits.community: All contributors and testers who help refine the dream of perfect training.

author.title: The Mission & The Maker
author.bioPart1: I'm Moser, a mechanical engineer and lifelong chess student. Born in Kazakhstan (1985), living in Germany (2003).
author.bioPart2: Chessboard.fun is my dream of a professional tool that empowers players to study effectively, which only became possible through modern AI and workflow automation.
author.bioPart3: Fluent in Russian and German, always polishing my English. Thank you for joining this journey!

about.footerNote: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è for those who seek chess mastery.

settings.title: Opening Trainer Settings
settings.variabilityHint: Higher variability means the bot plays less popular moves more often.
settings.masterHint: Bot plays optimal moves from Master games.
settings.lichessHint: Bot simulates human play styles based on selected ratings.
